title: Languages
description: I am proficient in several programming languages including Java, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, and C#.

title: Frameworks
description: I have experience working with various frameworks such as Unity, Vue.ts, ASP.Net, .NET, SpringBoot, Express, Next, React, Node.js, MongoDB, and PostGreSQL.

title: Developer Tools
description: I am familiar with a range of developer tools including Git, Docker, AzureDevOps, Maven/Gradle, SonarQube, Visual Studio Code, and Figma.

title: Libraries
description: I have used several libraries in my projects, such as SCSS, Tailwind CSS, Redux, and Pinia.

title: Electronics
description: During my studies, I learned to program a STM32 ship and it was part of an important project. I can also use Arduino and Eagle softwares.

title: DevOps
description: I have utilized Ansible, GitLab, and Docker for deployment and automation, which streamlined the development process and improved efficiency. These tools are integral to my work, and I use them extensively for school, work, and personal projects.
